food.name: Red Velvet Cupcake
Red Velvet Cupcake
food.description: Delight in our Red Velvet Cupcake: moist, cocoa-infused cake topped with creamy, tangy frosting. A heavenly treat for any occasion.

food.name: Carrot Cake
Carrot Cake
food.description: Enjoy our Carrot Cake: a moist and flavorful delight, rich with shredded carrots, warm spices, and topped with smooth cream cheese frosting.

food.name: Croissant
Croissant
food.description: Savor our Croissant: a buttery, flaky pastry, expertly crafted to perfection. Light, airy, and golden brown, it's the ultimate indulgence for breakfast or any time of day.
